moduleInfo.moduleDesc: This is a module to get data from Anitaku (formerly GoGoAnime) website

javascriptConfig.javaScript: function processData(response) { var dataArray = []; var parser = new DOMParser(); var doc = parser.parseFromString(response, 'text/html'); var items = doc.querySelectorAll('.last_episodes li'); items.forEach(function(item) { var title = item.querySelector('a').getAttribute('title'); var link = 'https://anitaku.to' + item.querySelector('a').getAttribute('href'); var image = item.querySelector('img').getAttribute('src'); dataArray.push({ title: title, link: link, image: image }); }); return dataArray; }

function processData(response) { var dataArray = []; var parser = new DOMParser(); var doc = parser.parseFromString(response, 'text/html'); var items = doc.querySelectorAll('.items li'); items.forEach(function(item) { var title = item.querySelector('a').getAttribute('title'); var link = 'https://anitaku.to' + item.querySelector('a').getAttribute('href'); var image = item.querySelector('img').getAttribute('src'); dataArray.push({ title: title, link: link, image: image }); }); return dataArray; }
